Class DBController

java.lang.Object
dbController.DBController
public class DBController extends Object
Handles all direct access to the database. Only this class talks to JDBC. This controller manages all database operations including reservation CRUD operations, customer management, table management, opening hours, date overrides, billing, report generation, waitlist management, and no-show/reminder operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamen Abu Ahmad

  • Constructor Details

    • DBController

      public DBController(String dbName, String dbUser, String dbPassword)
      Constructs a new DBController with the specified database connection parameters.
      Parameters:
      dbName - the name of the database to connect to
      dbUser - the username for database authentication
      dbPassword - the password for database authentication

  • Method Details

    • testConnection

      public boolean testConnection()
      Tests whether a connection to the database can be successfully established.
      Returns:
      true if the connection is successful, false otherwise

    • getActiveReservations

      public List<common.entity.Reservation> getActiveReservations() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all active reservations from the database. Active reservations include those with status ACTIVE, NOTIFIED, or IN_PROGRESS.
      Returns:
      a list of active Reservation objects ordered by reservation datetime ascending
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getWaitlistReservations

      public List<common.entity.Reservation> getWaitlistReservations() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reservations currently on the waitlist.
      Returns:
      a list of Reservation objects with WAITING status ordered by creation time ascending
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReservationFields

      public boolean updateReservationFields(int reservationNumber, LocalDateTime newDateTime, int newGuests) throws SQLException
      Updates the datetime and number of guests for an existing reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservationNumber - the ID of the reservation to update
      newDateTime - the new date and time for the reservation
      newGuests - the new number of guests
      Returns:
      true if the reservation was successfully updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • insertReservation

      public common.dto.Reservation.InsertReservationResult insertReservation(int customerId, LocalDateTime reservationDateTime, int numberOfGuests) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new advance reservation into the database. Generates a unique 6-digit confirmation code and retries up to 5 times if duplicates occur.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer making the reservation
      reservationDateTime - the date and time of the reservation
      numberOfGuests - the number of guests for the reservation
      Returns:
      an InsertReservationResult containing the reservation ID and confirmation code, or null if insertion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • insertNotifiedNow

      public common.dto.Reservation.InsertReservationResult insertNotifiedNow(int customerId, int numberOfGuests, int tableId) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new walk-in reservation with NOTIFIED status and assigns a table immediately.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      numberOfGuests - the number of guests
      tableId - the ID of the table to assign
      Returns:
      an InsertReservationResult containing the reservation ID and confirmation code, or null if insertion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • insertWaitlist

      public common.dto.Reservation.InsertReservationResult insertWaitlist(int customerId, int numberOfGuests) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new waitlist entry for a walk-in customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      numberOfGuests - the number of guests
      Returns:
      an InsertReservationResult containing the reservation ID and confirmation code, or null if insertion failed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getTableIdToCapacity

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getTableIdToCapacity() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a mapping of table IDs to their capacities.
      Returns:
      a Map with table ID as key and capacity as value
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getOverlappingPinnedTableIds

      public List<Integer> getOverlappingPinnedTableIds(LocalDateTime start, int durationMin) throws SQLException
      Returns table IDs of reservations that are pinned to a table right now (IN_PROGRESS or NOTIFIED) and overlap the given time window.
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the time window
      durationMin - the duration of the time window in minutes
      Returns:
      a list of table IDs that are occupied during the specified time window
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getOverlappingActiveGuests

      public List<Integer> getOverlappingActiveGuests(LocalDateTime start, int durationMin) throws SQLException
      Returns the number of guests for ACTIVE (unassigned) reservations that overlap the given time window. ACTIVE is a confirmed advance reservation but not seated yet (table_id is NULL).
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the time window
      durationMin - the duration of the time window in minutes
      Returns:
      a list of guest counts for overlapping active reservations
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findAvailableTableId

      public Integer findAvailableTableId(LocalDateTime start, int durationMin, int guests) throws SQLException
      Finds an available table that can accommodate the specified number of guests during the given time window.
      Parameters:
      start - the start time of the reservation
      durationMin - the expected duration of the reservation in minutes
      guests - the number of guests to accommodate
      Returns:
      the table ID of an available table, or null if no table is available
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findCustomerIdBySubscriptionCode

      public Integer findCustomerIdBySubscriptionCode(String code) throws SQLException
      Finds a customer ID by their subscription code.
      Parameters:
      code - the subscription code to search for
      Returns:
      the customer ID if found and subscribed, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findCustomerIdByPhoneOrEmail

      public Integer findCustomerIdByPhoneOrEmail(String phone, String email) throws SQLException
      Finds a customer ID by their phone number or email address. Phone is checked first, then email if phone doesn't match.
      Parameters:
      phone - the phone number to search for (can be null or blank)
      email - the email address to search for (can be null or blank)
      Returns:
      the customer ID if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      Returns:

      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      public int createGuestCustomer(String fullName, String phone, String email) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

    • updateReservationStatus

      public boolean updateReservationStatus(int reservationId, String newStatus) throws SQLException
      Updates the status of a reservation. For COMPLETED status, also sets checked_out_at timestamp. For IN_PROGRESS status, also sets checked_in_at timestamp.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to update
      newStatus - the new status to set
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getCancellableReservationsByCustomerId

      public List<common.entity.Reservation> getCancellableReservationsByCustomerId(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Gets all cancellable reservations for a customer. Cancellable statuses include ACTIVE, NOTIFIED, and WAITING.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of cancellable reservations ordered by datetime descending
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReceivableReservationsByCustomerId

      public List<common.entity.Reservation> getReceivableReservationsByCustomerId(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Gets all receivable reservations for a customer. Receivable means ACTIVE or NOTIFIED status with datetime at or before now.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer
      Returns:
      a list of receivable reservations ordered by datetime descending
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getNoShowReservationIds

      public List<Integer> getNoShowReservationIds() throws SQLException
      Gets the IDs of reservations that should be marked as no-shows. A no-show is an ACTIVE or NOTIFIED reservation that is 15+ minutes past its scheduled time.
      Returns:
      a list of reservation IDs that are no-shows
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReservationsForReminder

      public List<Integer> getReservationsForReminder() throws SQLException
      Gets the IDs of reservations that need a reminder notification. These are ACTIVE reservations scheduled for approximately 2 hours from now that haven't had a reminder sent yet.
      Returns:
      a list of reservation IDs needing reminders
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • notifyWaitlistReservation

      public boolean notifyWaitlistReservation(int reservationId, int tableId) throws SQLException
      Notifies a waitlist reservation by setting its status to NOTIFIED, assigning a table, and setting the reservation datetime to now.
      Parameters:
      reservationId - the ID of the reservation to notify
      tableId - the ID of the table to assign
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
